contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, December 27, 2021. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) ① This regulation shall enter into force on March 1, 2022. ② Article 25 (1) regarding the registration qualifications of leaders shall enter into force on January 1, 2024. However, in the case of regular member or associate member organizations that joined after the enforcement of this provision, there is a grace period of three years from the date of joining. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2022.01.24. (Enforcement date) This regulation will come into effect on March 1, 2022. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2022.06.16. Article 1 (Enforcement date) This regulation shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Application examples regarding ban on participation, etc.) Article 14 (1) 6 of this regulation is a partial revision of Act No. 18760 「National Sports Promotion Act」 Pursuant to the revised provisions of Article 14-4 of the Act and Article 2 of the Supplementary Provisions, it shall apply from cases where a guilty verdict is confirmed for an act committed after August 11, 2022, the effective date of the Act. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2023.02.10. (Enforcement date) This regulation comes into effect from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2023.05.04. (Enforcement date) This regulation will come into effect on June 28, 2023. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2023.07.05. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) This regulation shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Revision of the previous *Supplementary Provisions) ① December 27, 2021. Article 1, Paragraph 2 of the *Supplementary Provisions is amended as follows. ② Article 25 (1) regarding the registration qualifications of leaders shall enter into force on January 1, 2027. However, in the case of regular member/associate member organizations that joined after the enforcement of this provision, there is a grace period of three years from the date of joining.
